commit message: Project readme and license added.
Inital import of the Speech Trainer project to git.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:wrr/speech_trainer
Remove accidentally copied files
Propagate recording and playing initialization errors to the user.
Reset audio events history when the training activity is paused
Terminate gracefully when recording has failed because other application is using the microphone. Move part of the responsibilities of the AudioEventView to the TrainingApplication.
Adjust AudioTrack and AudioRecord buffers size.
Compatibility changes to support API level 3.
Comment why deprecated parameter is passed to AudioRecord and AudioTrack.
Further compatibility changes to support API level 3.
Comments updated
Safeguard to guarantee a full AudioBuffer is played and recorded. Small release related configurations changes
Fill output buffer with silence to make sure no audio is played after stopPlaying() returns.
Configure volume controls to change the music volume not the ringer volume.
Improve silence level detection algorithm.
An icon to indicate that playing is active. Show tooltips at the beginning of a training session.
Help added.
Small cleanups before the release.
Links to rate the app.
Menu item to rate the app.
Spanish translation
New version number
Issue #1 - add Spanish translations for html files (help and about)
fix typo in Spanish translation
Enable localization of help and about page
Version code for a new release.
Link to Android Market
Update README
Update README
